title: We need more long melee-ish silences
body:
{{champion:31}}  is a great example. {{champion:86}}  too.

RIght now these losers with a million short cooldown mobility tools and cc are just spamming their cheese all over ranked and these two champs are literally the ONLY counterplay to their nonsense. The 3 second silence wrecks those champs. We need MORE silences, not less.

They must be attached to champs that have no mobility though. Basically a wall of, "You done fucked up" if you get near them. If a mage gets that close, they deserve to die. Close range long silences are the only counter to these troll hyper mobile carries
